name: Broeder: Secrets of Ohr
blurb: [JRPG] A young, selfish bounty hunter mistakenly endangers those he loves most while exploring the dark secrets of his own past.

rewards.reward: No Reward

Primary Package: Thanks so much!! Every dollar makes a difference! As thanks, when choosing this tier, you will receive exclusive updates on kickstarter, a thank you email, and a wallpaper for your computer desktop (design not yet final). Every reward includes this thank you. :)
FIRST TO SPONSOR REWARD: Yay! For my first sponsors, in addition to the Primary Package, you will receive a free digital copy of the game!
Your name on the game's website under "special thanks."\r\n\r\n[see prize chart]

Receive a digital copy of the game's promotional art book! This art book contains promotional and concept art and is NOT for sale. It will no longer be available after the Kickstarter closes.\r\n\r\n[see prize chart]

SECOND TO SPONSOR REWARD: As a thank you for being the first few to sponsor, you receive an early bird special of the digital copy of the game as well as a digital copy of the promotional artbook! Thanks for the support.
Receive a digital copy of the game's original soundtrack! This will be released at the same time as the game in order to receive the full soundtrack.\r\n\r\n[see prize chart]
Digital copy of promotional art book + digital soundtrack! \r\n\r\n[see prize chart]
Digital copy of the game!!  [see prize chart]
Your name under "special thanks" in the final credits at the game's end + digital soundtrack + digital promotional art book + digital copy of the game\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]
Digital copy of the game + official game T-Shirt (design not yet final. Backers will vote). Estimated delivery date below indicates T-Shirt, not game product.\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]
Game Poster plus digital copy of all three: promotional art book, soundtrack, and game.\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]
Hardcopy AND digital copy of music CD. Also includes a digital copy of the game and promotional art book.\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]
HARDCOPY of the game with small booklet inside case cover + digital copy of game, promotional art book, and soundtrack.\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]

[Unlocked Reward #1] This is unlocked half way through the Kickstarter funding period. In addition to the $100 sponsor reward, you will receive a beta version of the game to test before the game is released!

You become officially recognized as one of the game's financial sponsors! You will receive credit in the game's final credits as "sponsor" (appears closer to the top of the credits) in addition to receiving the digital copy of the promotional art book, official soundtrack, and a copy of the game with a .pdf copy of the manual / booklet that comes with the game. All rewards over $100 receive this title. You will also be listed under this title on the list of credits on the website. :D\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]
You receive a hardcopy of ALL THREE: the game, the promotional art book, and the official soundtrack!\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]

Hardcopy of game, soundtrack, and promotional art book + T-shirt + game poster

(note: date below does not reflect delivery hard copy of the game, music, and art book. See the $125 pledge for estimated delivery date)

[see reward chart]

Become a dead civilian! Your name on a tombstone or grave marker somewhere in the game! Leave a phrase to go on your grave (in good taste, please). Example 1: "Loving mother of nine cats." Example 2: "Burry me upside down so everyone can kiss my butt." Etc. Delivery date shown below is the game's estimated completion date. I will contact you sometime during game production.\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]

Become a historical dead person! Not only are you dead, but you are remembered! You can be in a painting, a bust, an illustration the player can stumble across in a book, a statue in the park, a poster on a classroom wall! But are you famous--or infamous? See rules that apply. Delivery date shown below is the game's estimated completion date. I will contact you sometime during game production.\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]

Become an NPC (Non Playable Character). Not only will this character look like you, it will have your name. Pick out a job you like (civilian, shop keeper, traveling merchant, etc) and what you would like to say when the player talks to you. See rules that apply. Delivery date shown below is the game's estimated completion date. I will contact you sometime during game production.\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]

Design a battler (non-boss). Want to create your very own beast that you run across in a field? Go for it! Write about your beast for it's bio page in the beast log. Where does it live, what does it eat, what are its habits? Name it, battle it! See rules that apply. Delivery date shown below is the game's estimated completion date. I will contact you sometime during game production.\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]

Design your own mini side-quest! A bounty-hunting mission, a missing pet quest, a mini mystery, a funny trip to the beach town gone wrong--there's a lot that could be done. However, this reward does NOT come with a custom NPC. It is just the quest creation. See rules that apply. Delivery date shown below is the game's estimated completion date. I will contact you sometime during game production.\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]

NPC + Quest!! This reward is the $400 and $300 rewards combined. Now create a mini quest WITH your own NPC. NPC is non-playable, but perhaps they are the NPC you have to talk to in order to join the quest. If you want, they don't even have to be apart of the quest. Your NPC can be in another part of the game if you want. See rules that apply. Delivery date shown below is the game's estimated completion date. I will contact you sometime during game production.\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]

ADVENTURE PACKAGE: You can receive 3 Custom NPC designs and create 1 side quest. If you want, you may exchange only  1 NPC for 1 battler design. Your NPCs can be part of your quest or appear somewhere else in the game. It is up to you. See rules that apply. Delivery date shown below is the game's estimated completion date. I will contact you sometime during game production.\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]

*drum roll* BECOME A GUEST CHARACTER!! This was added in after great thought. Create a character that is an extra feature for the player to find and unlock. While your character will NOT permanently join the party or take place in main storyline events, he/she could instead take part in certain side quests, mini games, pop in on the player when they least expect it, and even sometimes be in battles with the party! Your character may even have his or her own hidden house or hometown somewhere on the map.  Also includes other rewards shown on the chart. I'm not going to lie, that's pretty sweet. See rules that apply. Delivery date shown below is the game's estimated completion date. I will contact you sometime during game production.\r\n\r\n[see reward chart]
